summary: This module offers GPU-accelerated linear algebra utilities for solving and inverting matrices, leveraging cuSOLVER and cuBLAS through CuPy. It includes routines for handling Hermitian matrices and batched operations, although the current implementations are not actively used elsewhere in the codebase.
business_intent: Provide high‑performance, GPU‑based matrix inversion and solving capabilities to support scientific and engineering applications that require fast linear algebra computations on large datasets.
